resources.string: Emulate receive of an SMS. Useful for debugging and testing only.
Every SMS send by this program will be shown in a dialog first. There will be an option Send or Cancel.
Program will handle this fake incoming SMS exactly like a real incoming SMS. Please note that you may force Findme to send a real SMS by this.
If a query arrives by an SMS, program will answer it. It will turn on GPS, get your position and send it to an asking device by an SMS. Evrybody will know where are you.
If a query arrives an SMS, program will ignore it.
If a query arrives by an SMS, program will reply, that it will not send your position. Everyone may know that you have that application working but nobody will get you position.
Ask before sending a SMS reply
Ask before using Internet connection for a reply
Where is the phone with number

The other person must also have this application in his phone and replying must be enabled, otherwise it will not work and he will get a confusing SMS with a findme:// URL. Do not send Findme requests to people that do not use this app.
EEE, MMM d, yyyy hh:mm:ss aaa
I have got a reply without location
Sender does not know his location
Sender does not want to tell you his location

* History of communication
 * Contacts integration
 * Better request handling - service, notification
 * Other then GPS location sources
 * Pushes and the Internet
 * Project www pages
 * Public positions
 * Internal map
 * Friends
 * Encryption and signature
 * Slave mode
 * More than just location

This program can be used for loacalisation of a phone A by its GPS module, special SMS from a phone B and generated SMS reply from the phone A. You must install the app to both phones and enable GPS in A. You will be able any time later to send a SMS from B do A. The app in A will detect it, turn on GPS, sends a SMS to B. The app in B will detect it and show GPS coordinates of A with an option to show it in an external map application.

This app is designed to tell somebody your location by a SMS reply. Please note that sending a SMS normally costs some money (the price depends on your mobile provider). Please note that the person sending SMS query may be not your friend, it may be some hacker which has broken security of your mobile provider network, it may be an extra payed number and it also may be somebody who shlould not know your location. Please also note that every app code (including this one) may contain errors. If you do not accept this, please uninstall this app.
